title: THE BFG MAP (Walls) Alpha

replies.body:
You can post your screenshots here: http://imgur.com/
After that, you can put a link here on the forums, along with your map details.

Just out of curiosity, what "BFG" stand for?

replies.body: You could also use postimage. I like it because you don't need to create an account and the direct link is right there for you to copy. The only downside is that you can't create albums on it, so uploading a lot of screenshots might be harder.
replies.body_tagged: You could also use postimage. I like it because you don't need to create an account and the direct link is right there for you to copy. The only downside is that you can't create albums on it, so uploading a lot of screenshots might be harder.

replies.body: you don't need an account for imgur either, it's fast, you can make albums and the direct link you can get by rightclick and copy image url
